name: Deploy Laravel Project on push
on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
jobs:
  web-deploy:
    name: Deploy
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Get the latest code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node
        uses: actions/setup-node@master
        
      - name: Setup Enviroment
        uses: shivammathur/setup-php@v2
        with:
          php-version: '8.1'
      # - name: Copy .env
      #   run: php -r "file_exists('.env') || copy('.env.example', '.env');"
      # - name: Install Dependencies
      #   run: composer install --no-interaction
      - name: update Dependencies
        run: composer update --no-interaction
      # - name: Generate key
      #   run: php artisan key:generate
      - name: Generate storage link
        run: php artisan storage:link
      # - name: Directory Permissions
      #   run: chmod -R 775 storage bootstrap/cache
      - name: ðŸ“‚ Sync files
        uses: SamKirkland/FTP-Deploy-Action@v4.3.4
        with:
          server: ${{ secrets.FTP_SERVER_ONE_BUILD_PLUS }}
          username: ${{ secrets.FTP_USERNAME_ONE_BUILD_PLUS }}
          password: ${{ secrets.FTP_PASSWORD_ONE_BUILD_PLUS }}
          server-dir: "./obp/OBP/"
          local-dir: "./"  # Correction : Changement de "./" Ã  "./public/"
          exclude: "./public/**, ./obp/OBP/public/"

      - name: Transfer public folder
        uses: SamKirkland/FTP-Deploy-Action@v4.3.4
        with:
          server: ${{ secrets.FTP_SERVER_ONE_BUILD_PLUS }}
          username: ${{ secrets.FTP_USERNAME_ONE_BUILD_PLUS }}
          password: ${{ secrets.FTP_PASSWORD_ONE_BUILD_PLUS }}
          server-dir: "./obp/"
          local-dir: "./public/"
          exclude: "index.php"
